mapper.insert: insert into upbit_coin_min (coin_ticker, datetime_utc, datetime_kst, o_price, h_price, l_price, c_price, trade_volume, trade_price_volume) values (#{id}, #{datetime_utc}, #{datetime_kst}, #{open_price}, #{high_price}, #{low_price}, #{trade_price}, #{volume}, '') ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT upbit_coin_min_pk DO UPDATE SET o_price = #{open_price}, h_price = #{high_price}, l_price = #{low_price}, c_price = #{trade_price}, trade_volume = #{volume}
